The publication of the photo on Facebook: 2020, showing Priyanka Gandhi Vadra and Rahul Gandhi.
The Hindi caption of the Facebook post: which translates to English as "Opposition leaders going to Hathras, you can clearly see their faces how sad they are #BrotherSisterDrama."
The timing of the post: which circulated just days before the Gandhis met the parents of a gangrape victim in Hathras on October 3, 2020.
Reverse image and keyword searches on Go: as it was published on the official Twitter account of the Indian National Congress on April 27, 2019.
